testcase.classname: Calculate Annuity BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: Calculate Annuity from /calc-annuity rest service
testcase.system-out: Given details of "5000" , "5.0" and '24' to create calculate annuity request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to calculate annuity..........................passed Then validate correct annuity "219.36" is calculated successfully...........passed

testcase.classname: Calculate Annuity BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: Calculate Annuity from /calc-annuity rest service 2
testcase.system-out: Given details of "5000" , "5.0" and '12' to create calculate annuity request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to calculate annuity..........................passed Then validate correct annuity "428.04" is calculated successfully...........passed

testcase.classname: Calculate Annuity BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: When duration is set as zero, validate it does not calculate annuity and an error is prompt

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The sum of all principal amounts in the schedule entries equals the total loan amount
testcase.system-out: Given details of "5000.0","5.0",'12' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................passed Then validate sum of all principal amounts equals the total "5000.0" amount.passed

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The sum of all principal amounts in the schedule entries equals the total loan amount 2
testcase.system-out: Given details of "1200.0","2.0",'10' and "2019-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................passed Then validate sum of all principal amounts equals the total "1200.0" amount.passed

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The start date determines the first due date of the calculated schedule. We assume
testcase.system-out: Given details of "5000.0","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................passed Then validate each schedule entry is always due on the same day as the "2018-01-01".passed

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The start date determines the first due date of the calculated schedule. We assume 2
testcase.system-out: Given details of "8000.0","4.0",'6' and "2018-02-04" to create generate Plan request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................passed Then validate each schedule entry is always due on the same day as the "2018-02-04".passed

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The remaining outstanding principal of one entry equals the initial outstanding
testcase.system-out: Given details of "5000.00","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................passed Then validate remaining outstanding principal of one entry equals the initial outstanding principal of the following month.passed

testcase.classname: Generate Plan BDD Scenarios and Test Cases
testcase.name: The total payment amount per month in a borrower schedule should equal the value
testcase.system-out: Given details of "5000.00","5.0",'4' and "2018-01-01" to create generate Plan request payload.passed When user invoke rest service to generate Plan..............................passed Then validate borrowerPaymentAmount of each month should be equal except the last month which can differ.passed
